item.title: Reranking Laws for Language Generation: A Communication-Theoretic Perspective
item.description: Boost LLM reliability by adding redundancy! This paper uses a communication theory framework to show that generating multiple LLM outputs and reranking them significantly reduces errors, even with imp…
